title: You Don’t Want To Be a Jamoke
text:
Back to School...

Dana Perino, former White House Press Secretary, co-host of Fox News Channel's "The Five" and host of "The Daily Briefing" and Chris Stirewalt Fox News Politics Editor run through the daily goings on in the world of politics.

This week, anticipation builds for the upcoming battle between Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren, Dana gives her thoughts on the new Netflix documentary from Barack and Michelle Obama, Chris discusses why Stacy Abrams is an "overhyped political figure".

Plus, Chris takes on trivia.
description: This week, Dana gives her thoughts on the new Netflix documentary, Chris discusses why Stacy Abrams is an “overhyped political figure” and more.
